name: react-share-follow
description: React component for Share and Follow on social networks
author: Tom SÃ¶derlund <tom@tomsoderlund.com>

scripts.new: touch src/New.js; touch src/New.css; touch stories/New.stories.js; echo ADD NEW COMPONENT HERE >> src/index.js; echo Created component New.js, to rename do:; echo mv src/New.js src/MyComponent.js; echo mv src/New.css src/MyComponent.css; echo mv stories/New.stories.js stories/MyComponent.stories.js; echo ALSO update index.js
scripts.test:
echo 'Running Standard.js and Jasmine unit tests...
' && yarn lint && yarn unit
scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel ./src -d dist --copy-files
